job.title: Data Scientist
job.description: What We Are Looking ForbrbrWe are growing the Clinical Insights team at DeepIntent As a Data Scientist you will be working closely across DeepIntent Analytics teams located in New York City India and Bosnia The role will support internal and external business partners in defining patient and provider audiences and generating analyses and insights related to measurement of campaign outcomes Rx patient journey and supporting evolution of DeepIntent product suite Activities in this position include creating and scoring audiences reading campaign results analyzing medical claims clinical demographic and clickstream data performing analysis and creating actionable insights summarizing and presenting results and recommended actions to internal stakeholders and external clients as neededbrbrKey ResponsibilitiesulliSupport business development and client analytics and insights process utilizing consumer demographic clickstream and clinical data claims and medicationsliulliUtilizing ML for modeling claims and media datasolutionsliliStructuring and setting up automated reports to measure performanceliliAnalyzing campaigns and use cases including deep dive into demographic digital clinical and behavioral drivers of patients and providersliulliExtract explore visualize and analyze longitudinal healthcare claims Rx etc consumer demographic mobile and clickstream data using SQL Python or RliliUtilize ML API infrastructure and cloud environmentsliliSupport internal product development of data tools dashboards and forecasts as neededbrliulWho You ArebrulliUnderstanding of the adtech  digital marketing and advertising data and campaigns and aptitude for learning the healthcare data pharma medical claims provider data Rx etcliliDesire to work in a rapidly growing and scaling startup with a strong culture of fastpaced cross functional collaborationliliHandson predictive modeling experience decision tree boosting algorithms and regression modelsliliOrientation and interest in translating complex quantitative results into meaningful findingsliliHypothesis oriented curiosity and tenacity in obtaining meaningful results through iterative data analysis and data prepliliCan do attitude outstanding technical troubleshooting and problemsolving abilities aptitude to rapidly develop working knowledge of new tools opensource libraries data sources etc liliAbility to meet deadlines and flexibility to work constructively with shifting prioritiesbrliulWhat You have AccomplishedbrulliBachelors degree in a STEM field such as Statistics Mathematics Engineering Biostatistics Econometrics Economics Finance or Data ScienceliliAt least 2 years of working experience as Data Analyst Engineer Data Scientist or Researcher in digital marketing consumer advertisement telecom or other areas requiring customer level predictive analyticsliliProficiency in performing statistical analysis in R or Python including relevant libraries is requiredliliAdvanced ability to use relevant technologysoftware to wrangle data perform analytics and visualize for consumption is requiredliliAdvanced experience with SQL is requiredliliAdvanced experience with basic Office Suite Excel PowerPoint is requiredliliExperience with Gitversion control is strongly preferredliliExperience with cloud technologies such as AWS or Google Cloud preferredliliExperience with a visualization tool such as Looker and  or Tableau preferredbrliulWhat We OfferbrulliCompetitive compensation packageliliEligibility to receive shares in the Companys
